data.message: Thank you Facebook for all that you do. I'm a senior citizen. When ever I feel lonely or I'm missing my family and friends I can always reach out and touch.

replies.message: Thanks for sharing with us, Irma. Sounds like you're enjoying your Facebook experience. -Abby
You're welcome Abby. Had to BLOCK a few people, but that's a part of life I suppose.

Irma Robinson Hi Irma, I can relate to you being a senior myself. One of my good friends from years of ago just brought that to my attention. Needless, to say, I really didn't need a reminder. However, I needed to call my church secretary for some information; and she lifted me up with some good news that she thought she would share.
I hear you Florence. Going to the church of ones choice can be very enlightening, empowering and inspiring as well. I've added meditation ( prayer) to my routine as well.
Facebook(null) Hello, I already sent you massage on messenger regarding some one steel my relative face book account, please reply to me with best regards.
